content: **size** 1 2 **measurements** finished foot circumference 16 5 20 cm / 6½ 8 - to be worn with 1 5-2 5cm / ½-1 negative ease foot length is adjustable **materials** hobbii unicorn solid shade caramel 21 1 skein **needles** 2 5 mm / us 2 circular needle 100cm / 40 length for magic loop or needles suitable for working small circumferences in the round always use a needle size that will result in the correct gauge after blocking **yarn quality** fingering / 4-ply-weight 75% wool 25% polyamide 100 g 3 5 oz = 400 m 437 yds **gauge** 36 sts & 52 rounds = 10 cm / 4 over st st in the round after blocking ****pattern information** the oak seed socks are knitted cuff-down in one piece starting with a picot edge then half-twisted rib stitch the socks are decorated with lace on the top of the foot and texture over the leg the heel is made with the heel flap and gusset method **find the pattern in more languages here ** german 1 danish 2 swedish 3 norwegian 4 finnish 5 french 6
